docs.title: STEP 01- Create a repository by using template repository
STEP 03- Create a conda environment after opening the repository in VSCODE
STEP 06- commit and push the changes to the remote repository
Data Preparation Stage
docs.text:
• Convert the data into train.tsv and test.tsv in 70:30 ratio
data.xml

    |-train.tsv
    |- test.tsv
  • We are choosing only three tags in the xml data.
  • Row ID
  • Title and body
  • Tags (stackoverflow tags specific to python)
Tags feature names row ID row ID title and body text stackoverflow tags Label- Python
